They undergo percutaneous laparoscopic intraoperative radiofrequency ablation ( RFA ) . Patients undergo FDG-PET scan within 48 hour 7 day RFA . FDG-PET image evaluate residual disease , include focal FDG uptake site ablation . Beginning 1 month RFA , patient undergo contrast-enhanced MRI routine post-ablation follow-up .
